title: Lovely Sarah Jessica Parker By Sara Jessica Parker For Women. Eau De Parfum Spray 1 OZ
description: Launched by the design house of Sarah Jessica Parker in 2005, LOVELY SARAH JESSICA PARKER is a women's fragrance that possesses a blend of amber, lavender, orchid, musk, and apple.  It is recommended for casual wear.When applying any fragrance please consider that there are several factors which can affect the natural smell of your skin and, in turn, the way a scent smells on you.  For instance, your mood, stress level, age, body chemistry, diet, and current medications may all alter the scents you wear.  Similarly, factor such as dry or oily skin can even affect the amount of time a fragrance will last after being applied

title: WEN by Chaz Dean Sweet Almond Mint Texturizing Balm 0.35 oz
description: WEN Texture Balm is the ideal finishing touch for creating looks with definition, separation and texture. It's designed to provide hold and shape for either long or short hairstyles.
